page.title: 16Employment
page.content: {Employment at Dounreay {Our school has 182 parents employed at {Dounreay.Dounreay itself has 2300 {employees,most of whom live in {Thurso.Here are some of the forms of {employment at Dounreay: {scientist,quantity surveyor,mechanic, {electrician,policeman,accountant and {health and safety officers. Other Employment Simpson & Oag,a local plumber employs several plumbers who receive an average weekly wage of Â£154.54.They work forty hours a week and have six weeks holiday. {Here are some more jobs found locally: {butcher,baker,dentist,postman,grocer, {milkman,policeman,florist,teacher,bus {driver,taxi driver and optician.
